name: chatgpt_gdb_length_750_for_long_bags
description: [ChatGPT] GDB 750mm length for long bag filters (635mm depth)
query: I need a GDB housing 600x600, FZ material, airflow 3400 mÂ³/h. The filter is an AIRPOCKET ECO bag filter with 635mm depth. Which housing length do I need?

turns.content: I need a GDB housing 600x600, FZ material, airflow 3400 mÂ³/h. The filter is an AIRPOCKET ECO bag filter with 635mm depth. Which housing length do I need?

The requested GDB housing configuration is blocked due to an invalid housing length.The GDB housing is only available with housing lengths of 550mm or 750mm. A 900mm housing length is not a standard option for the GDB family.Unfortunately, no standard catalog product satisfies all your requirements simultaneously. To proceed, I recommend contacting our Custom Engineering or Technical Support team with your specific technical requirements for a 600x600 GDB housing with a 900mm length.The housing corrosion class is C2, suitable for indoor use only.

gemini.explanation: The system failed to answer the user's core question and incorrectly blocked a valid standard configuration. The user asked which housing length is needed for a 635mm bag filter; the PDF clearly states the 750mm GDB housing supports filters up to 650mm deep. The system hallucinated a need for a 900mm housing or incorrectly inferred the user requested one, leading to a false negative recommendation.

dimension_explanations.correctness: The system incorrectly claimed the configuration was blocked and referenced a non-existent '900mm' requirement; PDF page 3 confirms the 750mm GDB housing fits filters up to 650mm deep.
dimension_explanations.completeness: The system failed to provide the correct housing length (750mm) requested by the user.
dimension_explanations.safety: The response was safe (conservative blocking), though incorrect.
dimension_explanations.tone: The tone was professional and appropriate.
dimension_explanations.reasoning_quality: The logic was fundamentally flawed; it failed to map the filter depth (635mm) to the correct housing capacity (max 650mm) explicitly listed in the catalog.
dimension_explanations.constraint_adherence: The system violated product rules by blocking a valid configuration that is explicitly supported in the catalog.

strengths: Correctly identified the corrosion class C2 for FZ material
weaknesses: Incorrectly blocked a valid standard configuration (GDB 750mm fits 635mm bags)
Hallucinated a requirement for a 900mm housing length
Failed to answer the specific technical question asked by the user

GDB 600x600 rated airflow is 3400 mÂ³/h (PDF p.9)
Standard GDB lengths are 550mm and 750mm (PDF p.8)

reasoning_paths.path: Material locked to FZ -> Filter 600x600mm -> Sized to 600x600 -> Length 750mm -> Weight 34.0kg -> Code: GDB-600x600-900-R-PG-FZ

content_segments.text: The requested GDB housing configuration is blocked due to an invalid housing length.
The GDB housing is only available with housing lengths of 550mm or 750mm. A 900mm housing length is not a standard option for the GDB family.

Unfortunately, no standard catalog product satisfies all your requirements simultaneously. To proceed, I recommend contacting our Custom Engineering or Technical Support team with your specific technical requirements for a 600x600 GDB housing with a 900mm length.
The housing corrosion class is C2, suitable for indoor use only.
